frameset.edef: to break up, to be scattered

example.parse: (VP (SUB_CONJ اِن) (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS ُه)) (S (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اِن) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لَن)) (IV3FS+IV تَنفَض) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL المُظاهرات))))) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART سَوفَ)) (IV3MS+IV يِكُون) (ADVP-PRD (DEM_PRON هِناك)) (NP-SBJ (NP (ADJ مَزِيد)) (PP (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN الدِماء))) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NP (NOUN اَنصار) (NP (DET+NOUN البَقاء))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN اَنصار) (NP (DET+NOUN التَغيِير))))))))))))
